sentence: In early trading on Wednesday, shares of General Electric ( GE ) topped the list of the day's best performing Dow Jones Industrial Average components, trading up 0.7%.
Year to date, General Electric has lost about 9.9% of its value.
And the worst performing Dow component thus far on the day is Home Depot ( HD ), trading down 0.7%.
Home Depot is showing a gain of 14.7% looking at the year to date performance.
Two other components making moves today are Cisco Systems ( CSCO ), trading down 0.5%, and DuPont ( DD ), trading up 0.7% on the day.
The views and opinions expressed herein are the views and opinions of the author and do not necessarily reflect those of Nasdaq, Inc.
